item.title: CVE-2021-36920|2024-09-17T01:01:21.855Z -- wpchill -- download%20monitor%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Authenticated Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability discovered in WordPress plugin Download Monitor (versions <= 4.4.6).
